text: And a tree said to man, My roots are in the deep of the red earth, and I will give thee my fruit. And the man said to the tree, How we are alike! My roots also dwell deep in the red earth. And the red earth gives you power to give me your fruit and the red earth teaches me to receive from you with gratitude. FIN
title: La tierra roja
author: Gibrán Jalil Gibrán
